metadata.title: CVE-2021-21326 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: GLPI is an open-source asset and IT management software package thatprovides ITIL Service Desk features, licenses tracking and softwareauditing. In GLPI before version 9.5.4 it is possible to create tickets foranother user with self-service interface without delegatee systems enabled.This is fixed in version 9.5.4.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
